scripts.reset:module:ios: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-* && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && pod cache clean --all && cd ..
scripts.reset:module:android: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-* && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.reset:module: rm -rf android && rm -rf ios && pnpm install --force && pnpm run prebuild:clean && pnpm run reset:module:ios && pnpm run reset:module:android
